abstract: chartwell retirement residences receives c$ 17.04 average target price from brokerages .
article: chartwell retirement residences has received a consensus recommendation of `` buy '' from the six research firms that are currently covering the firm , marketbeat . com reports . two investment analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and two have issued a buy rating on the company . the average 1-year price objective among brokers that have covered the stock in the last year is c$ 17.04 . csh . un has been the subject of several research analyst reports . royal bank of canada increased their price objective on chartwell retirement residences from c$ 16.00 to c$ 16.50 in a report on monday , november 13th .

td securities increased their price objective on chartwell retirement residences from c$ 17.50 to c$ 18.00 in a report on monday , november 13th . canaccord genuity reiterated a `` hold '' rating and issued a c$ 16.00 price objective on shares of chartwell retirement residences in a report on sunday , november 12th . bmo capital markets reiterated an `` outperform '' rating and issued a c$ 17.50 price objective on shares of chartwell retirement residences in a report on monday , november 27th . finally , national bank financial reiterated an `` outperform '' rating and issued a c$ 17.75 price objective on shares of chartwell retirement residences in a report on monday , november 27th .

shares of chartwell retirement residences traded up c$ 0.04 during mid-day trading on tuesday , reaching c$ 15.96 . the company had a trading volume of 240,903 shares , compared to its average volume of 360,917 . chartwell retirement residences has a 52 week low of c$ 14.43 and a 52 week high of c$ 16.50 . the stock has a market cap of $ 3,360.00 , a pe ratio of 122.77 and a beta of 0.27 . illegal activity warning : `` chartwell retirement residences receives c$ 17.04 average target price from brokerages '' was originally posted by watch list news and is the property of of watch list news .
